name: nextcloud
description: Nextcloud Server is a self-hosted file sync and share platform with extensible app ecosystem. It provides file storage, collaboration tools, and access control with full privacy and security.
features: File sync and share: Synchronize files across devices with selective sync and automatic conflict resolution.
Collaborative editing: Work on documents simultaneously with real-time updates and version tracking.
App ecosystem: Extend functionality with hundreds of apps for calendars, contacts, mail, and more.
Access control: Manage permissions with user groups, share links, and expiration dates.
End-to-end encryption: Protect sensitive files with client-side encryption for maximum privacy.
Mobile and desktop clients: Native apps for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, and Linux.
WebDAV support: Access files from any WebDAV-compatible client or operating system.
Activity monitoring: Track file changes, shares, and user actions with detailed audit logs.
External storage: Connect to S3, FTP, SMB, and other storage backends as unified file system.
Video calls: Built-in video conferencing with screen sharing and chat via Nextcloud Talk.
Federation: Share files and collaborate with users on other Nextcloud instances securely.
Two-factor authentication: Enhance security with TOTP, WebAuthn, or other 2FA methods.
